CreateExperimentTemplate.name: CreateExperimentTemplate
CreateExperimentTemplate.description: Grants permission to create an AWS FIS experiment template

DeleteExperimentTemplate.name: DeleteExperimentTemplate
DeleteExperimentTemplate.description: Grants permission to delete the AWS FIS experiment template

GetAction.name: GetAction
GetAction.description: Grants permission to retrieve an AWS FIS action

GetExperiment.name: GetExperiment
GetExperiment.description: Grants permission to retrieve an AWS FIS experiment

GetExperimentTemplate.name: GetExperimentTemplate
GetExperimentTemplate.description: Grants permission to retrieve an AWS FIS Experiment Template

InjectApiInternalError.name: InjectApiInternalError
InjectApiInternalError.description:
Grants permission to inject an API internal error on the provided AWS service from
                                                an FIS Experiment

InjectApiThrottleError.name: InjectApiThrottleError
InjectApiThrottleError.description:
Grants permission to inject an API throttle error on the provided AWS service from
                                                an FIS Experiment

InjectApiUnavailableError.name: InjectApiUnavailableError
InjectApiUnavailableError.description:
Grants permission to inject an API unavailable error on the provided AWS service from
                                                an FIS Experiment

ListActions.name: ListActions
ListActions.description: Grants permission to list all available AWS FIS actions

ListExperimentTemplates.name: ListExperimentTemplates
ListExperimentTemplates.description: Grants permission to list all available AWS FIS experiment templates

ListExperiments.name: ListExperiments
ListExperiments.description: Grants permission to list all available AWS FIS experiments

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list the tags for an AWS FIS resource.

StartExperiment.name: StartExperiment
StartExperiment.description: Grants permission to run an AWS FIS experiment

StopExperiment.name: StopExperiment
StopExperiment.description: Grants permission to stop an AWS FIS experiment

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to tag AWS FIS resources

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to untag AWS FIS resources

UpdateExperimentTemplate.name: UpdateExperimentTemplate
UpdateExperimentTemplate.description: Grants permission to update the specified AWS FIS experiment template
